red.docs:
**percentage**: The percentage of the red component. Defaults to `100%`.

*See also: [Color](https://esphome.io/components/display/index.html#color)*

red_int.docs:
**integer**: The brightness of the red component on a scale of `0` to `255`. Defaults to `255`.

*See also: [Color](https://esphome.io/components/display/index.html#color)*

green.docs:
**percentage**: The percentage of the green component. Defaults to `100%`.

*See also: [Color](https://esphome.io/components/display/index.html#color)*

green_int.docs:
**integer**: The brightness of the green component on a scale of `0` to `255`. Defaults to `255`.

*See also: [Color](https://esphome.io/components/display/index.html#color)*

blue.docs:
**percentage**: The percentage of the blue component. Defaults to `100%`.

*See also: [Color](https://esphome.io/components/display/index.html#color)*

blue_int.docs:
**integer**: The brightness of the blue component on a scale of `0` to `255`. Defaults to `255`.

*See also: [Color](https://esphome.io/components/display/index.html#color)*

white.docs:
**percentage**: The percentage of the white component. Defaults to `100%`.

*See also: [Color](https://esphome.io/components/display/index.html#color)*

white_int.docs:
**integer**: The brightness of the white component on a scale of `0` to `255`. Defaults to `255`.

*See also: [Color](https://esphome.io/components/display/index.html#color)*

hex.docs:
**string**: The color in hexadecimal representation. Defaults to `FFFFFF`.

*See also: [Color](https://esphome.io/components/display/index.html#color)*
